1.1.2.name: wordpress/facebook-recommend-widget
1.1.2.description:
This plugin displays a Facebook Recommend (or Like) button as a widget on your site. I created this plugin since I wanted a unique Facebook page to be refered no matter from what page or subpage that the client was on when pressing the Recommend-button. The Open Graph Settings makes it possible to define your Facebook page through the Wordpress back-end interface.

The latest version also include an option to have the Send button link to the current page instead of a static URL.

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions please contact me.
